description: Single source of truth for dashboard metrics with provenance

total_orders.notes: Full dataset including all order statuses

historical_order_count.notes: DEPRECATED - This was from Snowflake pull 2026-01-05. Current data (2026-01-07) shows 82,350 orders. Reports referencing 80,724 need updating.

supply_zones_with_partners.definition: Zones where Dinneroo partners are configured/onboarded

behavioral_zones_with_orders.methodology: COUNT(DISTINCT ZONE_NAME) WHERE Dinneroo orders exist
behavioral_zones_with_orders.definition: Zones with actual Dinneroo customer orders during trial period
behavioral_zones_with_orders.notes: Trial period: Sep 2025 - Dec 2025. Note: 197 of these had sufficient data for statistical analysis (mvp_threshold_discovery.json)

zones_with_sufficient_data.methodology: Zones meeting minimum sample size thresholds for analysis
zones_with_sufficient_data.definition: Zones with enough orders for reliable statistical analysis

expansion_opportunity_zones.definition: Zones with partners configured but no orders yet - ready for activation
expansion_opportunity_zones.notes: Dashboard shows 234 (using 435-201), should be 233 (using 434-201). Minor discrepancy from rounding.

threshold_metrics.description: Two types of thresholds: data-driven inflection points (where metrics improve) and business MVP requirements (minimum for launch)

inflection_points.description: Data-driven thresholds where key metrics show significant improvement

partners.rationale: 3 of 4 metrics show inflection at 3-4 partners

cuisines.rationale: Cuisines add independent value beyond partner count

dishes_per_partner.rationale: Dishes per partner shows stronger independent effect than total dishes

mvp_requirements.description: Business-defined minimum requirements for zone launch readiness

cuisines_min.justification: Covers diverse family preferences - Italian, Indian, Asian, Chicken, Thai

dishes_min.justification: Minimum 3 dishes per core cuisine Ã— 7 cuisines

repeat_rate_min.justification: Families find value and return - top zones: 40%+

trial_period.description: Dinneroo trial period for behavioral data

order_count_discrepancy.resolution: 80,724 was from an earlier Snowflake pull (2026-01-05). Current data (2026-01-07) has 82,350 orders. All reports should use 82,350.
order_count_discrepancy.action: Update MASTER_ANALYSIS_REPORT.md and other reports to use 82,350

zone_count_discrepancy.resolution: 434 = supply zones with partners; 201 = behavioral zones with orders; 150 was incorrect query
zone_count_discrepancy.action: Use 434 for supply, 201 for behavioral, always specify which
